short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search, calculate prices and manage gift products
short.vi: Tìm kiếm, tính toán giá và quản lý các sản phẩm quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Gift Card Mall" is an extension on the Chrome browser that helps users easily search and calculate prices of gift products. With a simple and easy-to-use interface, this extension allows users to Choose from a variety of products like handbags, water bottles, notebooks, Bluetooth headphones, premium towels and more.

Users can select the product and enter the desired quantity, then the utility will automatically calculate the price based on the selected product information. Additionally, users can also set reminders for their gift cards by entering the expiration date and clicking the "Set Reminder" button.

The utility provides an additional "Favorites" feature, allowing users to save their favorite products. When users click the "Add to Favorites" button on each product, that product will be added to the favorites list. Users can also view the list of favorite products and delete them at any time by clicking the "Clear Favorites" button.

With "My Gift Card Mall", searching, calculating prices and managing gift products becomes easier and more convenient than ever.

Contact us:
